events.name: The Stonefang Ascent
events.description: The road into the interior winds its way up the Stonefang Ascent, a narrow mountain pass infamous for its dangers. The path is a treacherous track of loose scree, flanked on one side by a sheer cliff face and on the other by a dizzying drop. The wind howls incessantly between the jagged, tooth-like peaks, carrying a permanent chill. Rockfalls are common, and the many shadowed overhangs make for perfect ambush spots.

possibilities.description: Turn back before the ascent becomes too perilous.
